column1: #Text=And the best part about it , Eska does n't know I 'm here .
#Text=" Eska says : " I 'm not on the hunt for you .
#Text=" Desna says : " We search for Varrick .
#Text=Our father wishes him to stand trial .
#Text=" Asami says : " What did he do ?
#Text=" Eska says : " He is a traitor to the Water Tribe , along with our aunt and uncle .
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra 's parents were arrested ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah , he 's a cop .
#Text=" Northern guardsman says : " Varrick 's not here .
#Text=Desna , let us continue our search elsewhere .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yes , yes , my sweet koala otter .
#Text=" Eska says : " You are so cute when you grovel .
#Text=" Asami says : " Do n't let her treat you that way .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I tried to break up with her , but Mako gave me terrible advice .
#Text=" Mako says : " Wait , how are your girl problems my fault ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Bolin , you need to be honest with her .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Honesty is for fools , kid .
#Text=" Varrick says : " If you want to ditch this girl , then make yourself scarce .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Somewhere Unalaq will never find me .
#Text=" Mako says : " The coast is clear .
#Text=Not until I know it 's absolutely 157 % safe .
#Text=" Asami says : " Your assistant 's in there too ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Zhu Li never leaves my side .
#Text=We 're in a bear for crying out loud !
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm gon na go see how Korra 's doing .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Bolin , I got a little something for you ' round back .
#Text=Unalaq 's rigged this trial , no doubt about it .
#Text=So I need you to make sure my trusty rebels stay out of prison .
#Text=" Bolin says : " What 's the money for ?
#Text=There 's always someone willing to look the other way for a few yuans .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I think I catch your drift , Varrick - bear .
